verses.verse: Why do the heathen <S%H1471><s%> rage <S%H7283><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the people <S%H3816><s%> imagine <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a vain thing <S%H7385><s%> ?

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> set <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves, and the rulers <S%H7336><s%> <S%H8802><s%> take counsel <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8738><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and against his anointed <S%H4899><s%>, saying,
Let us break <S%H5423><s%> their bands <S%H4147><s%> asunder <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and cast away <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their cords <S%H5688><s%> from us.
He that sitteth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall laugh <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: the YY <S%H136><s%> shall have them in derision <S%H3932><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Then shall he speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto them in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, and vex <S%H926><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them in his sore displeasure <S%H2740><s%>.
Yet have I set <S%H5258><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my king <S%H4428><s%> upon my holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.

I will declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the decree <S%H2706><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, Thou art my Son <S%H1121><s%>; this day <S%H3117><s%> have I begotten <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

Ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of me, and I shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee the heathen <S%H1471><s%> for thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and the uttermost parts <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for thy possession <S%H272><s%>.

Thou shalt break <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them with a rod <S%H7626><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; thou shalt dash them in pieces <S%H5310><s%> <S%H8762><s%> like a potter's <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>.
Be wise <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8685><s%> now therefore, O ye kings <S%H4428><s%>: be instructed <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8734><s%>, ye judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> with fear <S%H3374><s%>, and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with trembling <S%H7461><s%>.

Kiss <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the Son <S%H1248><s%>, lest he be angry <S%H599><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and ye perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%>, when his wrath <S%H639><s%> is kindled <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8799><s%> but a little <S%H4592><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> are all they that put their trust <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in him.
